Basket","params":{"_basset":"Address of the ERC20 token to add to the Basket","_key":"Bytes32 key that will be used to lookup price in "},"convertBitmapToBassets(uint32,uint8)":{"details":"Convert bitmap representing bAssets location to Bassets array","params":{"_bitmap":"bits set in bitmap represents which bAssets to for all bAsset addresses","return":"bitmap with bits set according to bAsset address position"},"handlePegLoss(address,bool)":{"details":"Executes the Auto Redistribution event by isolating the Basset from the Basket","params":{"_basset":"Address of the ERC20 token to isolate","_belowPeg":"Bool to describe whether the basset deviated below peg (t) or above (f)"},"return":"alreadyActioned Bool to show whether a Basset had already been actioned"},"initiateRecol(address,address)":{"details":"Sends the affected Basset off to the Recollateraliser to be auctioned","params":{"_basset":"Address of certain quantity of Bassets, in exchange for burning the relative Masset quantity from the User","params":{"_bassetQuantity":"Exact quantities of Bassets to basket"},"setBasketWeights(address[],uint256[])":{"details":"External call to set weightings of a new Basket","params":{"_bassets":"Array of Basset addresses","_weights":"Array of Basset weights - devdoc.author: Stability Labs Pty Ltd
devdoc.details: Base layer functionality for the Masset

addBasset(address,bytes32).details: External func to allow the Manager to conduct add operations on the Basket

params._basset: Address of the ERC20 token to add to the Basket
params._key: Bytes32 key that will be used to lookup price in Oracle

addBasset(address,bytes32,uint256).details: External func to allow the Manager to conduct add operations on the Basket

params._basset: Address of the ERC20 token to add to the Basket
params._key: Bytes32 key that will be used to lookup price in Oracle

burn(uint256).details: Destoys `amount` tokens from the caller.     * See `ERC20._burn`.

completeRecol(address,uint256).details: Completes the auctioning process for a given Basset

params._basset: Address of the ERC20 token to isolate
params._unitsUnderCollateralised: Masset units that we failed to recollateralise

convertBitmapToBassets(uint32,uint8).details: Convert bitmap representing bAssets location to Bassets array

params._bitmap: bits set in bitmap represents which bAssets to use

convertBitmapToBassetsAddress(uint32,uin.details: Convert bitmap representing bAssets location to bAssets addresses

params._bitmap: bits set in bitmap represents which bAssets to use

decimals().details: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation.

getAllBassetsAddress().return: return an array of bAssets addresses

getBasset(address).details: Get all basket assets, failing if the Basset does not exist
getBasset(address).return: Struct array of all basket assets

getBassets().return: Struct array of all basket assets

getBitmapFor(address[]).details: Returns the bitmap for given bAssets addresses

params._bassets: bAsset addresses for which bitmap is needed

getBitmapFor(address[]).return: bitmap with bits set according to bAsset address position

getBitmapForAllBassets().details: Get bitmap for all bAsset addresses
getBitmapForAllBassets().return: bitmap with bits set according to bAsset address position

handlePegLoss(address,bool).details: Executes the Auto Redistribution event by isolating the Basset from the Basket

params._basset: Address of the ERC20 token to isolate
params._belowPeg: Bool to describe whether the basset deviated below peg (t) or above (f)

handlePegLoss(address,bool).return: alreadyActioned Bool to show whether a Basset had already been actioned

initiateRecol(address,address).details: Sends the affected Basset off to the Recollateraliser to be auctioned

params._basset: Address of the Basset to isolate
params._recollateraliser: Address of the recollateraliser, to which the tokens should be sent

lockForgeValidator().details: Locks the ForgeValidator into it's final form

mintBitmapTo(uint32,uint256[],address).details: Mint with bAsset addresses in bitmap
mintBitmapTo(uint32,uint256[],address).return: massetMinted returns the number of newly minted mAssets

mintSingle(address,uint256).return: returns the number of newly minted mAssets

params._recipient: receipient of the newly minted mAsset tokens

mintSingleTo(address,uint256,address).return: returns the number of newly minted mAssets

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

negatePegLoss(address).details: Negates the isolation of a given Basset

redeemBitmapTo(uint32,uint256[],address).details: Redeems a certain quantity of Bassets, in exchange for burning the relative Masset quantity from the User

params._bassetQuantities: Exact quantities of Bassets to redeem
params._recipient: Account to which the redeemed Bassets should be sent

redeemSingle(address,uint256).details: Redeems a certain quantity of Bassets, in exchange for burning the relative Masset quantity from the User

params._bassetQuantity: Exact quantities of Bassets to redeem

removeBasset(address).details: Removes a specific Asset from the Basket, given that its target/collateral level is 0 As this is a cleanup operation, anybody should be able to perform this task

params._assetToRemove: The asset to remove from the basket

removeBasset(address).return: bool To signify whether the asset was found and removed from the basket

setBasketWeights(address[],uint256[]).details: External call to set weightings of a new Basket

params._weights: Array of Basset weights - summing 100% where 100% == 1e18

setFeePool(address).details: Set the recipient address of forge fees

setRedemptionFee(uint256).details: Set the ecosystem fee for redeeming a masset

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token

upgradeForgeValidator(address).details: Upgrades the version of ForgeValidator protocol

devdoc.title: Masset
